text: @DHSCgovuk @CMO_England @CMOWales @PHE_uk @publichealthni @PublicHealthW @scotgovhealth @healthdpt @NHSEngland #coronavirusuk #COVID19 progression: recorded infections. Take number itself with a massive pinch of salt (no community testing), and NB today's figures on numbers tested were irreconcilable with yesterday's. Subject to that, the news is not as bad as it might be https://t.co/vlgNwzYTzK

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
